column5: Heading out for Ontario and Press Lake Camp tomorrow morning for a two week stay. I think this will be my 6th year of 2 weeks on beautiful Press Lake. Gerry, Barbara and Ryan, who run the camp, are the best! The folks who stay at the camp are mostly return customers and are a friendly group. My good friend Terry will be with me the first week and my good friend Rick will join me in week 2. Both guys are great fishing partners, though, clearly, I seriously outfish them every year. In June, I was in Ontario for a week with a different group and we had the best fishing in the 12 years we have fished Lake Pashkokogan. Well, gotta pack up the boat and my 4runner! "I listen to the voices in my tackle box."
Have a safe trip up, and have a GREAT time! Hope you catch lots of fish and have perfect weather. Juls
Have a good trip Doc. I had to come home early. Bring plenty of bug dope along.
I just got back from Canada. Wish I was going back today. Good luck!
Hi drlee, have a great trip!!!!!!!Thank you,Larry Mac
Have a great and safe trip! Catch one our two for the rest of us back in the States wishing we were in the boat next to you! Let us know how you did!
I, too, leave tomorrow morning! Heading to Black Bear Lodge on Red Lake, Ontario. 3rd "annual" trip for my son and I...cannot wait!-42

Good Luck!! Have a safe trip. I was up the same week as Lovetofish for a trip further north on Horseshoe Lake. Like he said, bring plenty of bug spray. They're much worse than they were when you were up last.
